alert.note: Alert for Logan County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 3:40PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Gusty winds will impact portions of central Logan County through 415 PM MDT... At 339 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from near Peetz to near Sterling, or along a line extending from 11 miles southwest of Sidney to 31 miles north of Akron. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sterling, Fleming, Iliff, Peetz, Crook, Proctor, Padroni and Twin Buttes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM MDT for northeastern Colorado.
